game.name: Whisper of the Swallows
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Brave a savage and unforgiving procedurally-generated world where extreme weather and the nightmares of the dark are your greatest enemies. Alone or in co-op, survive, build, and explore to transform a cursed hellscape into your sanctuary of light.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Brave a savage and unforgiving procedurally-generated world where extreme weather and the nightmares of the dark are your greatest enemies. Alone or in co-op, survive, build, and explore to transform a cursed hellscape into your sanctuary of light.
